value.content:
[
  {
    "type": "deprecated_algorithm",
    "severity": "critical",
    "algorithm": "RC4",
    "description": "RC4 stream cipher is deprecated due to known biases in keystream that can lead to information leakage and cryptographic attacks.",
    "evidence": "RC4 stream cipher initialization patterns detected at 0x730d8 and 0x142",
    "recommendation": "Replace RC4 with modern stream ciphers like ChaCha20 or use AES in CTR mode"
  },
  {
    "type": "custom_crypto",
    "severity": "high", 
    "algorithm": "XOR Cipher",
    "description": "Proprietary XOR encryption detected. Custom cryptographic implementations are highly discouraged due to lack of cryptographic review and potential vulnerabilities.",
    "evidence": "XOR encryption/decryption loops detected at 0x6d and 0xa985",
    "recommendation": "Replace custom XOR cipher with standard authenticated encryption algorithms like AES-GCM"
  },
  {
    "type": "weak_algorithm",
    "severity": "high",
    "algorithm": "AES or DES",
    "description": "Potentially weak block cipher implementation with proprietary modifications. Unable to confirm exact algorithm or security properties.",
    "evidence": "S-box pattern with multiple table accesses detected in 14 functions, proprietary implementation",
    "recommendation": "Use standard, well-reviewed cryptographic library implementations of AES with known secure modes of operation"
  }
]
